document_data.name: Impresk
document_data.mainbody: '''Impresk''' was a barony of the monarchy of [[Erlkazar]], which encompassed the territory of the [[Snowflake Mountains]].
document_data.Description:
Impresk was the barony responsible for ensuring that the monster population of the Snowflake Mountains remained low and defending the trade road to [[Riatavin]].

The barony was inhabited by many "hill clans" and contained several farming villages, a few logging and shepherding towns in the foothills, and a single mining town.
document_data.Geography: Impresk Barony was the northernmost of Erlkazar's five baronies. It bordered [[Carrelath]] and [[Shalanar]] to the south. [[Shilmista]], the Forest of Shadows, was its western border, and [[Impresk Lake]] was located at the southeast edge.
document_data.Government:
The leader of Impresk, as of 1370 DR, was Baron [[Jivam Tammsel]], who, oddly enough, was a [[Half-dragon|half-]][[steel dragon]] [[ranger]]. He was selected by the hill clans to lead despite his draconic heritage. 

As of 1479 DR, the Day Baron of Impresk was Tolarran, who was described as youthful and ambitious.

Notable Locations.[[Castle Trinity]]: The ruins of this former keep were once the site of a secret sect of the goddess [[Talona]].
Notable Locations.[[Edificant Library]]: This famous library to [[Deneir]] and [[Oghma]] was brought to ruin by the [[Chaos Curse]].<ref>
Notable Locations.Impresk Lake: This lake was ice cold and connected to the [[Deepwash]] by a [[Shalane River|short river]].
Notable Locations.[[Kholmeth]]: This shepherding village was the closest settlement to the baron's hunting lodge in the central Snowflakes.
Notable Locations.[[Nightglow]]: This cave was the former lair of the [[red dragon]] [[Fyrentennimar]].
Notable Locations.Snowflake Mountains: These were some of the tallest peaks in the south of [[Faer√ªn]].
Notable Locations.[[Spirit Soaring]]: This cathedral to Deneir was built on the site of the old Edificant Library.
